title: Take 5
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Thai, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. They offer a vegan breakfast. Changing menu of vegan in-house-made curries every day. Uses organic ingredients and local sourcing of produce whenever possible. Selection of interesting reading material (recycled books and magazines), music and community events hosted.
